title: Pediatric Obesity Management Education Module: Blended Learning Based on the ADDIE Model

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical knowledge and basic understanding of pediatric health management
context.additional_context: Module-based design combining online theoretical learning and offline practical sessions, aimed at strengthening pediatric obesity case management capabilities reflecting Indian regional healthcare environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply pediatric obesity diagnostic criteria (body mass index, growth curve analysis) with 90% accuracy.
Learners can present three practical strategies for improving dietary habits to patients/caregivers.
Learners can explain culturally contextualized approaches when designing community-based weight management programs.
Learners perform communication techniques reflecting psychosocial factors in pediatric obesity education simulations with over 80% accuracy.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
